name: 楊士萱
objective:
本課程在於介紹科學及工程系統中數項常用數學之原理及應用，內容如下：
1. 複習實數與複數、向量與矩陣、向量空間、特徵值與特徵向量等重要數學概念。
2. 了解微分方程式、差分方程式、轉移函數等科學及工程系統中常用的數學模型。
3. 具備基本微分方程式與差分方程式的解題能力，並能應用於科學及工程系統中。
4. 利用連續系統與離散系統的對比，加深學生對重要概念的理解。
schedule:
Weeks 1-5: Quick review of Linear Algebra, Chapters 2, 3, 4. Quiz 1
Weeks 6-8, 10: Differential Equations, Chapter 5. (12)
Week 9: Midterm Exam covering the first two topics.
Weeks 11-14: Laplace Transforms, Chapter 9. (9) Quiz 2
Weeks 15-17: Difference Equations, Chapter 10. (6)
Week 18: Final Exam covering the materials after Midterm Exam.
scorePolicy:
1.Attendence and in-class recitations, 5%.
2.Written homeworks, 15%. Please hand in before the class begins (on Tuesdays). Please do not copy someone else' work.
3.Two 50-minute Quizzes, 30% (15% each).
4.80-minute Midterm exam, 25%.
5.80-minute Final exam, 25%.
materials:
Textbook:
Advanced Engineering Mathematics with MATLAB by T. L. Harman, J. Dabney, and N. Richert, 2nd edition, Brooks/Cole Thomson, 2000. （高立圖書代理）
Reference:
Advanced Engineering Mathematics by P. V. O’Neil, Thomson, 2007.
